mn86:3.9: saṅkaritvā → saṃharitvā saṃharitvā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); saṅgaritvā (sya-all, km)
mn86:6.11: Mahāvanaṃ pāpuṇi saccavādī → mahāvanaṃ samaṇoyaṃ paccupādi (bj); mahāvanaṃ samaṇa paccupādi (sya-all, km); mahāvanaṃ samaṇoyaṃ paccavādi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn86:6.12: Sohaṃ carissāmi pahāya pāpaṃ → sohaṃ carissāpi pahassaṃ pāpaṃ (bj); sohaṃ cirassāpi pahāssaṃ pāpaṃ (si); sohaṃ carissāmi pajahissa pāpaṃ (sya-all, km); sohaṃ cirassā pahāssaṃ pāpaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn86:13.8: Handa ca dāni → handadāni (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn86:15.2: yatohaṃ, bhagini, jāto → bhagini jātiyā jāto (si)
mn86:18.3: pubbeva → yo ca pubbe (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn86:18.24: pana kiñci naṃ → kañcanaṃ (bj); kañci naṃ (si, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
mn86:18.38: naṃ hiṃsāmi kiñci naṃ → kañci naṃ (si, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); kañcanaṃ (?)
mn86:18.59: Svāgataṃ → sāgataṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | nāpagataṃ → nāma sagataṃ (mr)
